What's coinbase?

Coinbase is one of the most trusted and widely used cryptocurrency exchanges in the world. It offers a secure, user-friendly platform for buying, selling, and managing a broad range of digital assets. Designed for both beginners and experienced investors, Coinbase combines simplicity with advanced features and regulatory compliance.

  • Buy, sell, and hold hundreds of cryptocurrencies
  • Regulated and compliant with major financial standards
  • Robust security including cold storage and 2FA
  • Easy-to-use interface on both web and mobile

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to create and configure your API keys for KuCoin.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a coinbase Account

If you don’t already have a coinbase account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Management

  1. Log in to your coinbase account.
  2. In the left-hand navigation menu, click on More.
  3. Select Advanced API.

3 Configure Your API Key

  1. Click Create API. {% comment %} {% endcomment %}
  2. Enter a name for the API (e.g., “IsAlgo key”).
  3. Choose the appropriate portfolio: use "Default" for Spot trading and "Perpetuals" for Futures trading.
  4. Enable Trade execution.

4 Enable Security and Whitelist IP

  1. Paste our server's IP address in the IP whitelist field: {{ server_ip }} and click Add.
  2. Complete 2FA and any other required verification.
  3. Click Confirm to generate your API Key and Secret.

Complete the Integration

Copy your API Key and Secret, then paste them into the integration form in your IsAlgo automate dashboard. Ensure you keep your credentials safe and never share them.
